00024 /*! \file FusionCHPData.h This file provides CHP file reading capabilities.*/
00025 
00026 #include "calvin_files/data/src/GenericData.h"
00027 #include "calvin_files/utils/src/AffymetrixGuid.h"
00028 //
00029 #include <cstring>
00030 #include <fstream>
00031 #include <list>
00032 #include <string>
00033 #include <vector>
00034 //
00035 
00036 namespace affymetrix_fusion_io
00037 {
00038 
00039 /*! A base class for all CHP data objects. */
00040 class FusionCHPData
00041 {
00042 protected:
00043 
00044         /*! Sets the file name.
00045          * @param str The file name.
00046          */
00047         void SetFileName(const char *str) { filename = str; }
00048 
00049         /*! Gets the file name.
00050          * @return The file name.
00051          */
00052         std::string GetFileName() const { return filename; }
00053 
00054         /*! The CHP file name. */
00055         std::string filename;
00056 
00057         /*! Reads the contents of the file.
00058          * @return True if successfully read.
00059          */
00060         virtual bool Read() = 0;
00061 
00062         /*! Reads the header.
00063          * @return True if successfully read.
00064          */
00065         virtual bool ReadHeader() = 0;
00066 
00067         /*! Friend to the registration class as it will call the Read function. */
00068         friend class FusionCHPDataReg;
00069 
00070         /*! The file type identifiers associated with the CHP files the reader can parse. */
00071         affymetrix_calvin_utilities::AffymetrixGuidTypeList fileTypeIdentifiers;
00072 
00073         /*! The actual file type identifier in the file. */
00074         affymetrix_calvin_utilities::AffymetrixGuidType fileTypeIdentifier;
00075 
00076 public:
00077         /*! Destructor */
00078         virtual ~FusionCHPData() {}
00079 
00080         /*! Get the id of the file (only valid for Command Console "calvin" files)
00081          * @return The unique file id.
00082          */
00083         virtual affymetrix_calvin_utilities::AffymetrixGuidType FileId() = 0;
00084 
00085         /*! Returns the GenericData object associated with a Calvin file, NULL for GCOS files. */
00086         virtual affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericData *GetGenericData() = 0;
00087 
00088         /*! Gets the class name. */
00089         virtual affymetrix_calvin_utilities::AffymetrixGuidType GetObjectName() = 0;
00090 
00091         /*! Gets the file type identifiers associated with the CHP files the reader can parse.
00092          * @return The ids
00093          */
00094         affymetrix_calvin_utilities::AffymetrixGuidTypeList FileTypeIdentifiers() const { return fileTypeIdentifiers; }
00095 
00096         /*! Gets the file type identifier in the file (blank for GCOS files).
00097          * @return The id of the file.
00098          */
00099         affymetrix_calvin_utilities::AffymetrixGuidType FileTypeIdentifier() { return fileTypeIdentifier; }
00100 };
00101 
00102 /*! A class used to self register CHP data classes. */
00103 class FusionCHPDataReg
00104 {
00105 public:
00106         /*! Constructor */
00107         FusionCHPDataReg();
00108 
00109         /*! Destructor */
00110         virtual ~FusionCHPDataReg();
00111 
00112         /* Sets the file type ids.
00113          * @param fileTypeIds The identifiers that the CHP object is compatible with.
00114          */
00115         void SetFileTypeIds(const affymetrix_calvin_utilities::AffymetrixGuidTypeList &fileTypeIds);
00116 
00117         /*! Reads the contents of a CHP file.
00118          * @param fileName The full path to the input CHP file.
00119          * @return A pointer to the CHP data object. NULL if the read failed.
00120          */
00121         static FusionCHPData *Read(const std::string &fileName);
00122 
00123         /*! Reads the header of a CHP file.
00124          * @param fileName The full path to the input CHP file.
00125          * @return A pointer to the CHP data object. NULL if the read failed.
00126          */
00127         static FusionCHPData *ReadHeader(const std::string &fileName);
00128 
00129 private:
00130 
00131         /*! Creates a CHP reading object.
00132          * @param fileTypeId The file type in the CHP file.
00133          * @return The CHP object, NULL if not able to read the file.
00134          */
00135         static FusionCHPData *CreateObject(const affymetrix_calvin_utilities::AffymetrixGuidType &fileTypeId);
00136 
00137         /*! Makes an CHP data object.
00138          * @return The CHP data object.
00139          */
00140         virtual FusionCHPData *MakeObject() = 0;
00141 
00142         /*! A pointer to the first registered CHP reader. */
00143         static FusionCHPDataReg *m_Head;
00144 
00145         /*! A pointer to the next registered CHP reader. */
00146         FusionCHPDataReg *m_Next;
00147 
00148         /*! The file type identifiers associated with the CHP files the reader can parse. */
00149         affymetrix_calvin_utilities::AffymetrixGuidTypeList fileTypeIdentifiers;
00150 };
00151 
00152 }
